## i18n package

Utility functions to help working with locales.

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [byLocaleComparator(aLocContext, aLocaleExtractor)](./i18n.bylocalecomparator.md) | Returns a comparator that compares objects by their locale according to a locale preference |
|  [canonicalizeLocale(aLocale)](./i18n.canonicalizelocale.md) | Returns a canonicalized version of the locale |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [VERSION](./i18n.version.md) | Version and build number of the package |
